PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-12302017-10-05HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActPest Control Products Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Pest Control Products Regulations (Personal Use Import Exemption)
PrecisRegulations Amending the PEST CONTROL PRODUCTS REGULATIONS (PERSONAL USE IMPORT EXEMPTION) in order to protect human health and the environment by reducing the likelihood of Pest Control Products with unacceptable risks being legally imported via the personal use import exemption in the Pest Control Products Regulations, while ensuring tha regulatory integrity is maintained.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0220 Publication Date: 2017-10-18
AttachmentsAttachment
